column2: I will officially welcome our guest of honor. My speech will last for three minutes
column3: and on the first stroke of twelve
column4: Her Majesty will name the Buckingham with the traditional breaking of a magnum of champagne on the hull.”|Be Careful What You Wish For|Jeffrey Archer

column1: 11:57|By the time that it only wanted three minutes to noon
column2: the droll object in question was perceived to be a very diminutive foreign-looking young man. He descended the hills at a great rate
column3: so that every body soon had a good look at him.|The Devil in the Belfry|Edgar Allan Poe

column1: 11:57|A few minutes' light around noon is all that you need to discover the error
column2: and re-set the clock – provide that you bother to go up and make the observation.|Odalisque: The Baroque Cycle #3|Neal Stephenson
